version_description:
We made enhancements in order to provide you the best experience. In order not to miss the new features, do not forget to turn on auto updates.

- You can search with the QR code reader.
- With the Night Mode light protection filter, you can relieve eye strain while surfing the internet.
- With the Find in Page feature, you can enter your keyword and go to the appropriate section in the page.
- You have the opportunity to switch to the desktop view of all the websites that you searched for.
- With the new Private Mode Management Feature, private tabs you turn on when you leave hidden mode on all your devices are automatically turned off.
- Pop-up blocking feature allows you to browse the internet easily.
- You can personalize the frequently visited web sites and favorites sections on Yaani homepage.
- Russian and Ukrainian language support is provided.

For any recommendations or questions, you can contact us via destek@yaani.com or Menu->Feedback option in application. Enjoy searching!

We made enhancements in order to provide you the best experience. In order not to miss the new features, do not forget to turn on auto updates. For any recommendations or questions, you can contact us via destek@yaani.com or Menu->Feedback option in application. Enjoy searching!

The latest news is now available on the Yaani homepage.
We continue to implement many enhancements to make browsing the Internet enjoyable.

New version;
• Yaani 1 GB data consumption display,
• Adding Yaani widget to the iOS Toolkit,
• Sports shortcut, which you can access football matches and scores with a single click,
• Discount shortcut with discount coupons for certain brands,
And also offers bug fixes and performance improvements.

We made some improvements to give you a better user experience.
The problems about the news on the homepage was solved.
We've removed frequently visited sites from the home page for you (with the option to re-enable). So you can read the news more easily.
You can also enable frequently visited sites in the settings section.

We are constantly making improvements to offer you a better experience.

Additionally, we offer many other new features in this version:
•Password storage and protection with Touch ID
•Advanced website monitoring protection (blocking ad viewers, internet browsing without being tracked, blocking cookies etc.)
•Siri integration
•Downloads and reading list
We’ve made some improvements to provide you a better experience with the new update.
We made enhancements in order to provide you the best experience.

According to your requests,
- You can sort the shortcut buttons on the homepage as you wish with this update.
- You can turn off/on the news feed.

Yeni güncelleme ve iyileştirmeler ile birlikte seni çok daha iyi bir deneyim bekliyor!

• ‘’Ayarlar’’ üzerinden açabileceğin Türkçe mod ile yabancı dillerde içerik sunan sayfalar anında Türkçe olarak karşında!
• Yeni güncelleme ile birlikte artık anlık açık sekme sayını görebilirsin.
• Daha iyi bir deneyim yaşaman için uygulamada daha birçok farklı iyileştirme yapıldı.

A much better experience awaits you with the new update and improvements made on YaaniBrowser!

• You can instantly translate the content of non-Turkish websites into Turkish with the new feature called ‘’Turkish mode’’. Thus, you can access the information you are looking for much faster.
• More improvements have been made in the latest version of YaaniBrowser for you to have a better experience.

We will continue to make improvements on YaaniBrowserı in line with your requests!
Yeni güncelleme ile birlikte sizlere daha iyi deneyim sunabilmek için küçük iyileştirmeler yaptık.

YaaniTarayıcı’da yeni güncelleme ve iyileştirmeler ile birlikte seni çok daha iyi bir deneyim bekliyor!

● Yeni eklenen Yaani puan dünyasında Yaani’de yaptığın neredeyse her işlem için puan kazanabilir, kazandığın puanlarla hediye internetten TV+ ve fizy için 1 aylık üyelik kuponlarına kadar birçok hediye kazanabilirsin!
● Daha iyi bir deneyim yaşaman için YaaniTarayıcı’nın son sürümünde birçok konuda iyileştirme yapıldı.

YaaniTarayıcı’da senden gelen istekler doğrultusunda iyileştirmeler yapmaya devam edeceğiz!

Daha iyi bir deneyim yaşaman için YaaniTarayıcı Sesli Asistan ile karşında!

- YaaniTarayıcı'ya yeni eklenen YaaniAsistan sayesinde hava durumuna bakabilir, döviz kurlarını takip edebilir, istediğin videoları hızlı bir şekilde açabilirsin. Ayrıca Yaani’de yaptığın her aramayı Asistan ile yapabilirsin.

YaaniTarayıcı’daki yeni güncellemeleri ve iyileştirmeleri deneyimlemeye hazır mısın?
